Игра приеольная, необычная. Особенно понравилось когда появилась белая жидкость.Я так и не понял что эта за жыдкость ну и по... советую детям

Portal is a very good puzzle game with an enticing story.
Хороший сюжет и головоломки. Очень классный конец игры, саундтрек просто супер!
Эта игра очень хороша головоломки стоют более сложными по дальности
игра разнообразная, концовки неожиданные и особенно понравился coop-режим, купил игру не зря!
Для меня portal 2 лучше чем маинкрафт. Игра красивая и оптимизирована. Концовка вызывает мурашки. Также в игре можно создавать свои тесты и выкладывать в мастерскую.

Honestly, I would give it an 11. Valve, I BEG of you, make Portal 3 (and it doesn't even have to be Chell or GLaDOS or Wheatley! Make it about Cave Johnson, Caroline, some other test subject like Aperture Tag or Stories: Mel. I don't care.). I'll get a Steam Deck, SteamVR, ANYTHING to play a 3rd game.
Até agora foram as melhores 5 horas que eu ja gastei na minha vida

Me and my friends ENJOY playing this game, sure, the tests are difficult, but that doesn't mean you should stop, HECK! you can even make test chambers for others to enjoy! BEST GAME EVER! Hoping for a 3rd portal!

One of the greatest games I have ever played and would recommend to anyone. Great story, the characters and voices are amazing along with a very challenging set of puzzles and has a great replay value.
The holy grail of video games
Loved playing with physics in this one. It's an old game, but hoping there's support for more than two players. Great co-op game, and huge improvement from the first.
Buy this game so they let me go back to being in a proper computer instead of this potato.
Love this game. I watched three let's plays when i was a kid and now i played it myself. Still a gem.

Es un juegazo, mucho mejor que el 1, los puzzles son mas complejos,  y la segunda mitad del juego cambia bastante la dinámica, lo que lo hace mucho mas entretenido, hasta mezclando elementos de juegos de plataforma, siempre dentro de los puzzles. En su versión en español incluso son graciosos y sarcásticos los comentarios, y destaco que segun el pais desde donde descargues, hay una parte en el que el robot te hace chistes con tu acento regional.. super super recomendable.

Le premier jeu valve que j'ai eu entre les mains, sur XBOX. C'est avec un immense plaisirs que je rachete ce jeu sur leur propre platforme, l'univers est incroyable, le jeu reste beau et sa direction artistique n'a pas vieillit. Si vous voulez jouez a un jeu qui vous fera réfléchir, le tout dans un univers que vous devez décrypter par vous même a travers les dialogues et les décors du jeu, c'est juste parfait pour vous.
piu piu arminha de portal muito pica
Brain melting, but in the best way possible
Words are not enough to describe this masterpiece.
Disgustingly good, now I wish I had GLaDOS always with me to insult every decision I make
absolute must-play. comedy is great, sound design is amazing, graphics hold up better than some more recent games if i'm being honest.
